description:
Bounce & Break is an innovative break-out game taking place in a Zen Japanese universe. In this Zen world you will play in 4 different universes. Each universe is divided into 4 seasons. The best 2 scores are saved in the Top Ranking table. Be the best player to enter this Hall of Fame!

Two different game modes:

- The "classical" game mode. - The "orientation" game mode.

According to the game mode that has been selected, Gameâ€™s rules will slightly change.
name: Bounce & Break
